thread.title: adidas Unveils Triple Black UltraBOOST Cleat
thread.title_full: adidas Unveils Triple Black UltraBOOST Cleat

author: David Fischer
title: adidas Unveils Triple Black UltraBOOST Cleat
text:
Visit the original post to see all 3 images from this gallery. 
adidas today unveiled the limited edition triple black UltraBOOST Cleat. The triple black UltraBOOST Cleat continues to push the boundaries of style, engineering and craftsmanship for football cleats. In an interesting move, adidas went ahead and merged sneaker and football cleat design and innovation. The result is a cleat that redefines fit, feel and is of course also super lightweight. Find out more about the release of the adidas UltraBoost Cleat here .
